title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Foundational Math Competency Development for Youth with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary-Level Basic Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners solve basic daily-life mathematical problems (e.g., financial calculations, time management) with 80% accuracy.
Learners manage their learning progress at least 70% independently using visual/auditory prompts from a smartwatch.
Learners demonstrate positive learning attitudes (e.g., maintaining focus for 15+ minutes) at least three times through a reward system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
